name: Novotel London Greenwich

reviews.text: Difficult to fault this hotel really.
reviews.title: Great Hotel. Service and Location

likes.liked: — Great rooms, good location, excelelnt food, good service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Right next to a DLR station making access across the capital easy. Situated near to Greenwich Village which is safe to walk around at night with loads of nice restaurants nearby
reviews.title: Immaculate, great value hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My colleagues and I arrived on business and were pleasantly suprised by the cleanliness of the hotel and the pleasantness of the staff. The main plus point however, is the room spec. They are very large with flat screen TV (decent size) large bed, sofa, minibar, Internet, iron and ironing board.
reviews.title: Fantastic in comparrison to other 4* hotels in London

reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent quality and varied choice means there's something for everyone.
reviews.title: Very average. Not very comfortable.

reviews.text: Would throughly recommend this hotel to anyone for both business and pleasure as I loved it.
reviews.title: Still quite good, still the same problems

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel 5 or so times in the last 2-3 years! The main reasons i like this hotel as are follows:
reviews.title: I love this Hotel.

likes.disliked: — The toilet being seperate from the bathroom, but thats all!

reviews.text: Very courteous staff; excellent facilities - hair dryer, tea & coffee making facilities, mini bar, flatscreen tv, very large room, very comfy bed, always very clean, lots of space - room has sofa and desk and still plenty of room, good shower, nice layout, right beside a wine bar (excellent) and a very reasonably priced pub (double excellent) and you are literally 1 minute from greenwich mainline and DLR station (triple excellent).
reviews.title: Good short stay

reviews.text: You may worry that because the hotel is beside the railway you will be disturbed by noise, this is not the case, the sound-proofing is 100%, i have never heard a peep i didnt want to hear!
reviews.title: Avoid Breakfast!

reviews.text: On my first visit it was hight of summer and the air conditoning wasnt strong enough for my liking so i went downstairs and asked for an electric fan, the staff straight away fetched one and offered to carry it up for me, every time since i have asked for one and the staff have immediately gotten one for me.
reviews.title: Very Conveniently Situated

likes.disliked: — Lack of experience on front desk at check in.

reviews.text: the bar staff are very pleasant and will take your drinks up to your room if you so wish. the staff are eager to please and it shows.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel for a moderate price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel needs to install air conditioning - I have stayed several times and the rooms are fine in winter and very comfortable but when it's warm the 'air cooling system' is useless. It's very noisy with the window open as there are trains one side and a clock that chimes every hour the other!
reviews.title: hot rooms

reviews.text: Reception was almost non existant when my family and I arrived at the hotel at 10pm on a Saturday. Took almost 40 minutes to check in. No porter service provided, despite being laden with two suitcases and a baby.
reviews.title: Nice but not for me again!

reviews.text: Room was well prepared and hotel had taken on board that we woudl be arriving with a baby and had provided a clean cot for her use.
reviews.title: Hot Stuffy Rooma

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was very clean , so was the bathroom. One of the cleanest hotel rooms I have ever stayed in.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: Plasma screen TV in hotel room with full entertainment service.
reviews.title: Take That O2

reviews.text: Room was well appointed. Large tv, couch, comfortable bed and artsy bathroom. The toilet area was completely separate from the shower area but it wasn't too bothersome. Staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Breakfast was a large buffet with a wide variety of yummy foods. I've stayed at the Novotel in New York so was hesitant about staying here because my experience in NY was not the greatest, but this hotel is far nicer than the one in NY.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just got back from staying at this hotel over the weekend.
reviews.title: Inexpensive Hotel-ideal for O2 arena.

reviews.text: We booked through the hotel website & got a good deal.
reviews.title: Very impressed

reviews.text: Clean,comfortable no frills hotel,ideal if you are visiting the O2 arena.
reviews.title: Really good hotel

likes.disliked: — The noise from the DLR thoughout the night

reviews.text: We didnt eat in the hotel -so cant comment on that .However the service in the bar & at the front desk was efficient & pleasant.
reviews.title: Great Location for O2 (Dome)

description: The Novotel London Greenwich is a 4 star hotel in the heart of historic Greenwich, southeast London. Holiday makers are just 5 min walk from the National Maritime Museum and Royal Observatory and can explore the city with train and DLR station opposite the hotel. Business guests are just 12 min from the Canary Wharf financial district and enjoy the convenience of WiFi . Relax in our Elements Restaurant, L'attitude Bar and leisure suite. Limited pay parking on site operating on a first come first parked basis.
